Others: The Houston Rockets defeated the New York Knicks with a score of 109-97.
Alperen Sengun had a strong performance with 25 points and 14 rebounds, and four blocks.
Fred VanVleet had a bounceback game with 19 points, five assists, two steals, and one block.
The Rockets' defense was crucial in limiting Jalen Brunson to 29 points on 9-of-24 shooting.
The Rockets outscored the Knicks from within a few feet of the basket.
The Rockets improved their record to 4-3 and will face the San Antonio Spurs next.
